ability: All of your units have +1 Power.
Discard this instead of bidding to automatically win an Auction.
You can see the exact amount of Pearls each player has.
Your Echinoderms have +1 Power, Defense, and Movement.
All of your units have +1 Defense (maximum 5).
Discard this at the beginning of a battle to add +5 Power to your attack.
You can now select Amphibian Goons during the Recruit Phase.
